package.name: divvit
package.summary:
Proactive eCommerce Analytics!
Divvit presents insights in beautifully designed dashboards, reveals KPI performance related to market standards and give automatic recommendations for optimizations.
package.description:
EASY TO USE | MADE FOR ECOMMERCE | MOBILE READY | INDIVIDUAL SUPPORT
If everyone does what he or she does best, we all benefit. So let us do the data digging and let you focus on your business.
Divvit is made for eCommerce and available for all sizes. We base our insights on these four elements:
* Traffic - Get detailed reports on all your traffic channels and how they are performing
* Conversion - Knowing your users journey through your site and what makes them drop out or buy is crucial
* Order attribution - Analyze single orders and customers to find ways to increase loyalty
* Cost - Connect your marketing sources through our APIs to get full insights into your channels spend, efficency and ROI
You will get an instant performance overview from the insights dashboard. You can dig through drilldown reports for deeper discoveries and integrate all and any channels for cost benefit evaluation. Divvit will guide you all the way through and help you to focus your optimizations where needed.
Go to the Divvit features site to get a full overview or sign up to test our demo account.
